content: rock step slouch by e j kirkwood for chattanooga yarncrafters named for a step in appalachian clog dancing rock step slouch is a function-focused hat deep ribbing and a generous body keep ears warm and fit most head sizes and hair types the bold stranded colorwork pattern features mockingbirds and leaves of the state tree the tulip poplar and a mulberry leaf is included in the 60-stitch repeat stylized dogwood blossoms fill void spaces to keep focus on the primary motifs and reduce long floats a gathered crown forms a pragmatic pouchlike shape the sum is an eccentric appalachian design chattanooga yarncrafters is a chapter of the knitting guild association tkga and of the crochet guilds of america cgoa patterns released for chattanooga yarncrafters are designed to educate and engage while celebrating southern appalachia past and present thanks to testers aprilbe bluedonkey bookworm33329 colorsfromspace jenturm kaddykat kerkin knitragz mayellago mugginsquilts quiltyknitter and tnbirdmom rock step slouch by e j kirkwood for chattanooga yarncrafters 2 materials 60g each of two contrasting colors in wool acrylic alpaca or other fuzzy drapey fiber needles to achieve your preferred method of small-circumference in-the-round knitting closed-ring stitch markers to mark start of round and repeats yarn needle and scissors for finishing to fit head circumference toddler/child 19-20 /48-52cm teen/adult 21-22 /53-57cm adult xl 23-24 /58-62cm gauge over 4 /10cm stitch count and colorwork chart yarn weight fingering sport dk worsted aran gauge 28 sts 26 sts 24 sts 22 sts 20 sts toddler/child 132 -a 120 -
